sources.title: The Steel Claw (1961)
sources.description: A Marine stationed in the Philippines loses a hand in an accident and is discharged from the Corps. When the Japanese invade the Philippines, he is called back into service to rescue a general held by Filipino guerrillas behind Japanese lines. Attaching a steel prosthetic in place of his missing hand, he and his men set out on the mission, which turns out to be not quite what he was told it was. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-steel-claw-1961/

sources.title: The Steel Claw (1961) WWII ACTION
sources.description:
Stars: George Montgomery, Charito Luna, Mario Barri
 Writer/Director: George Montgomery

 A Marine stationed in the Philippines loses a hand in an accident and is discharged from the Corps. When the Japanese invade the Philippines, he is called back into service to rescue a general held by Filipino guerrillas behind Japanese lines. Attaching a steel prosthetic in place of his missing hand, he and his men set out on the mission, which turns out to be not quite what he was told it was.

metadata.Plot: A Marine stationed in the Philippines loses a hand in an accident and is discharged from the Corps. When the Japanese invade the Philippines, he is called back into service to rescue a general held by Filipino guerrillas behind Japanese lines. Attaching a steel prosthetic in place of his missing hand, he and his men set out on the mission, which turns out to be not quite what he was told it was.
metadata.Writer: Ferde Grofé Jr., George Montgomery, Malvin Wald
metadata.Actors: George Montgomery, Charito Luna, Mario Barri
